short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get rewards for using your browser, participate in draws and win prizes with Search Rewards extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add Search Rewards and monetize your browser. Do you want to receive free gift cards of your favorite brands every month? Simply use our Internet search through the reward system to earn attractive prizes.
Earn rewards from both Microsoft and our platform simultaneously.
By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing Search Rewards extension and setting search engine to Microsoft Bing that provided by the service, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. This extension changes your search engine to Microsoft Bing.
Terms of Use: https://search-rewards.com/eula
Privacy Policy: https://search-rewards.com/privacy-policy
About: https://search-rewards.com/about

You will receive points for your search activity. Exchange points for participation in monthly draws. The most active 100 participants will receive additional prizes!

Collect points in the background doing your own thing while you study, work, watch the news, shop and surf the Internet. The more points you accumulate, the higher your chances of winning these fantastic rewards.

Invite your friends and earn even more points thanks to the referral program. Earn 10% of all points accumulated by users you refer through our referral program.

Explore our extensive catalog of gift cards, ranging from popular retailers to online services. Customize your reward experience by choosing the gift cards that best suit your preferences.

Join the Search Rewards community today and transform your online experience into a rewarding journey!
